sentences.sContent: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.sCn: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

sentences.sContent: There are some reasons why some people believe they have gotten influenza after vaccination.
sentences.sCn: 有若干原因可说明为什么有些人认为他们在接种疫苗之后患上流感。

sentences.sContent: These findings might be explained by lack of timely vaccination and/or occurrence of disease at an early age.
sentences.sCn: 这些发现也许是由于没有及时接种疫苗以及/或者婴儿早期罹患过肺炎。

remMethod.val: vaccin(牛痘) + ation → 接种牛痘 → 接种疫苗
